EmailTemplate.description: Sent when an application is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Application Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Application has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Contact_First_Name__c}
You have successfully created an expression of interest. Your application ID is {!Application__c.Name}. You will be notified by email on whether your application has been successful.
If you have submitted a development form, we will contact you directly regarding any additional development funding you may receive.
If you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@biglotteryfund.org.uk with the application ID.
Regards Centre for Social Impact Bonds
